entry.content:
Date: 2017-08-05 Category: Newsletter Tags: MAVWC, News, Shows Authors: MAVWC

MAVWC Newsletter

Aug 2017

News and Business

  • Motorsportreg.com is a popular service by the racing clubs to manage event registration and payment. They also have an offering for car shows. Would we be interested in using this?

  • We are looking for ideas for a new meeting place. Please send suggestions to Big John

Schedule of Events

  • MAVWC meetings are the first Sundays of the month unless otherwise noted
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

Club Events

These are events all club members are highly enouraged to attend:

  • 8/6/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • 8/12/2017 Wisconsin Hotrod Radio 10th Anniversery show
    9am - 4pm
    Shower Arts Center 147 N Rural St, Hartford, Wisonsion

  • 8/12/2017 Karls Country Market Show
    10am to 2pm
    W156 N5646 Pilgrim Road Menomonee Falls, WI 53051

  • 9/3/2017 Wheels on Main
    Old Settlers Park, Downtown West Bend, Wisconsin
    If you have any questions please contact Anna or Carol at 262-338-3909

  • 9/10/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • 10/1/2017 West Allis Classic Car Show
    Greenfield Avenue between 70th & 76th, West Allis, Wisconsin

  • 10/8/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • 11/5/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • 12/3/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

Optional Events

These are events that club members may be going to:

Other Items

Here are some other events that we are aware of:

  • 8/26/2017 Windy City Dub Fest (WCDF)

  • July 14 2018 MoFoCo BugFest
    Great Lakes Dragway

  • Wednesday Night Classics has a calendar of events with tons of shows listed

  • Wisconsin Hotrod Radio has a calendar of events which has lots of shows

For Sale

  • Would anyone like to buy a large WW2 era Delta dual-head drill press, an Atlas Craftsman metal late, engine hoist, metal cutting bandsaw, or a keroene torpedo heater? If there is any serious interest, Ill provide information and set reasonable prices but you will have to move them. Contact Stephen for details.

Questions to the Club:

For More Information:

homepage
facebook
email

MAVWC Newsletter

Mar 2017

News and Business

  • https://www.motorsportreg.com is a popular service by the racing clubs to manage event registration and payment. They also have an offering for car shows. Would we be interested in this?

  • We are looking for ideas for a new meeting place. Please send suggestions to Big John

  • We have a 1966 Bug that was donated to the club! Please contact Larry about the work days (414-687-5988) or any other time you are able to help

Schedule of Events

  • MAVWC meetings are the first Sundays of the month unless otherwise noted
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

Club Events

These are events all club members are highly enouraged to attend:

  • 6/3/2017 MAVWC Annual Show
    Umansky Motor Cars
    1400 W Silver Spring Dr, Milwaukee, WI 53209

  • July 2 Allenton
    Typically on the 4th of July weekend

  • 7/9/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • July ?? 2017 Cruzin the Grove
    Silver Spur Texas Smokehouse BBQ
    13275 Watertown Plank Rd, Elm Grove, WI 53122, United States

  • 8/6/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • August ?? 2017 Germanfest
    Summerfest

  • 9/3/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • 10/1/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • October 1? West Allis

  • 11/5/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

  • 12/3/2017 MAVWC Meeting
    McDonalds on Hwy 100 and Greenfield Ave
    1550 S 108th St, West Allis, Wisconsin 53214

Optional Events

These are events that club members may be going to:

  • 7/8/2017 Kewaskum Classic Car Show

  • August ?? 2017 MoFoCo BugFest
    Great Lakes Dragway

Other Items

Here are some other events that we are aware of:

  • 8/26/2016 Windy City Dub Fest (WCDF)

For Sale

  • *4/25/2017 1963 Bus Vanagon Double Cab Pickup Truck. Three Door w/Custom Rear Pickup Bed. Storage Area/Cooler or Keg Setup. Custom Wood Railing. Flat Four Cylinder Engine. Floor Mount 4-Speed Manual. Brand New Restoration. Laser Straight Body. Stripped to Metal. Seven Coats of Single Stage Valspar. Early 60â€™s VW Colors. Custom Fabrication. All New Rubber. All New Glass. Four Month Restoration at Professional Shop. Recent Rebuild on Engine - Runs Strong. Mechanically Gone Through. Brand New Wiring. Brakes Rebuilt. Brand New Tires. Selling $32,500.00 Firm. In Minocqua,WI. 949-310-6262

  • 4/10/2017 1971 VW Super beetle convertible. First year of the super beetle convertible. Originally from California. Never driven in salt or snow here. Car is 85 to 90% restored. Needs interior finished to complete car. Have most all parts to complete interior. Engine rebuilt less than 1,000 mi ago. New convertible top, new paint, new floor pans, new master cylinder, new tires, rear torsion fixed/adjusted, new battery, etc. Car is clementine orange (an original color for 1971) with black top and grey and black interior (once it is all put in). Lots of extra parts, layer of dust included for free. $8000 or best offer. Email me at jkelly8@wi.rr.com or my phone is 414 758 6849.

Questions to the Club:

Looking for a referral for a car transporter for a short haul from Merrimac to Milwaukee.
Thank you,
Mike Southard
(708) 380-8387

For More Information:

homepage facebook email

entry.title: VolksFest 2016
entry.summary:
VOLKSFEST 2016

MAVWC VOLKSFEST 2016 will be our 23rd year!!

Hosted by UMANSKY 1400 W. Silver Spring.

The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is a not for profit organization of Volkswagen enthusiasts. VOLKSFEST, our annual show, which will be on June 4th, 2016 is a one-day car show. We are projecting â€¦
entry.content:
VOLKSFEST 2016

MAVWC VOLKSFEST 2016 will be our 23rd year!!

Hosted by UMANSKY 1400 W. Silver Spring.

The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is a not for profit organization of Volkswagen enthusiasts. VOLKSFEST, our annual show, which will be on June 4th, 2016 is a one-day car show. We are projecting 23 classes with 1st, 2nd and 3rd place trophies in each class!

Admission is free for spectators while registration for car exhibitors is $10 per vehicle.

Proceeds benefit the Childrenâ€™s Hospital of Wisconsin & the Cancer Foundation.

The show includes raffles, music & food.

More information: http://www.mavwc.com/ http://www.umanskymotorcars.com/

entry.title: MAVWC Cars and Coffee
entry.summary:
MAVWC Cars and Coffee

MAVWC Cars and Coffee will be at Krispy Kreme on 2900 108th St West Allis WI This show will be open to ALL types cars bikes and clubs. After a long winter, this is a great way to start off the car show season. There is â€¦
entry.content:
MAVWC Cars and Coffee

MAVWC Cars and Coffee will be at Krispy Kreme on 2900 108th St West Allis WI This show will be open to ALL types cars bikes and clubs. After a long winter, this is a great way to start off the car show season. There is a $10 entry fee. It is free to spectators and open to the public

More information: https://www.facebook.com/MAVWC https://www.facebook.com/events/1009295372426207/

entry.title: VolksFest 2015
entry.summary:
VOLKSFEST 2015

MAVWC VOLKSFEST 2015 will be our 22nd year!!
The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is a not for profit organization of Volkswagen enthusiasts. VOLKSFEST, our annual show, which will be on June 6th, 2015 is a one-day car show with the support of Concours Motors 1400 W Silver Spring â€¦
entry.content:
VOLKSFEST 2015

MAVWC VOLKSFEST 2015 will be our 22nd year!!
The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is a not for profit organization of Volkswagen enthusiasts. VOLKSFEST, our annual show, which will be on June 6th, 2015 is a one-day car show with the support of Concours Motors 1400 W Silver Spring Drive, Milwaukee, WI 53209. We have 23 classes with 1st, 2nd and 3rd place trophies1. Admission is free for spectators while registration for exhibitors is $10. Proceeds benefit the Childrenâ€™s Hospital of Wisconsin & the Cancer Foundation. The show includes raffles, music & food.

More information:
http://www.mavwc.com/
http://www.concoursmotors.com/
414-290-1525

  1. We need more sponsors! Contact us if you are interested in sponsoring a prize package ↩

entry.content:
VOLKSFEST 2014

MAVWC VOLKSFEST 2014 will be our 21st year!! The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is a not for profit organization of Volkswagen enthusiasts. VOLKSFEST, our annual show, which will be on June 7th, 2014 is a one-day car show with the support of Concours Motors 1400 W Silver Spring Drive, Milwaukee, WI 53209. We have over 18 classes with 1st, 2nd and 3rd place trophies. Admission is free for spectators while registration for exhibitors is $10. Proceeds benefit Childrenâ€™s Hospital of Wisconsin & the Cancer Foundation. The show includes raffles, music & food.

More information: http://www.mavwc.com/ http://www.concoursmotors.com/ 414-290-1525

entry.title: Call for Sponsors - VolksFest 2014
entry.summary:
VOLKSFEST 2014 SPONSOR OPPORTUNITY

The MIlwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is looking for individuals and businesses to sponsor trophy packages. Your businessâ€™ name or organization will be on the 1st, 2nd and 3rd place trophy in one class. This will be our 21st annual show on June 7th 2014. Proceeds to â€¦
entry.content:
VOLKSFEST 2014 SPONSOR OPPORTUNITY

The MIlwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is looking for individuals and businesses to sponsor trophy packages. Your businessâ€™ name or organization will be on the 1st, 2nd and 3rd place trophy in one class. This will be our 21st annual show on June 7th 2014. Proceeds to benefit Children's Hospital of Milwaukee and the Cancer Foundation.

Added bonus with package: Acknowledged via public address announcements, periodically throughout the Show. If you have a web site for your business; a link can be added on our club facebook site. Business flyers or business cards can be inserted into the 150 give-away bags.

Package price is $50.00 due May 1st. On behalf of the club, we would like to THANK YOU in advance for helping to ensure in making Volksfest 2014 a success.

20 CLASSES: â€¢ Daily Driver - All Years â€¢ Beetle Stock - 67 & Earlier â€¢ Beetle Stock - 68 & Later â€¢ Beetle Modified Standard & Super - All Years â€¢ Beetle Convertible Standard & Super - All Years â€¢ Super Beetle - All Years â€¢ Bus - 67 & Earlier â€¢ Bus - 68 & Later â€¢ Type 3 & 4 - All Years â€¢ Thing - All Years â€¢ Karmann Ghia - All Years â€¢ Dune Buggy - All Years â€¢ Sand Rail - All Years â€¢ Baja - All Years â€¢ Special Interest - Trike, Kit Cars - All Years â€¢ Water Cooled - Stock 74-92 â€¢ Water Cooled - Stock 93 & Later â€¢ Water Cooled - Modified 74-92 â€¢ Water Cooled - Modified 93 & Later â€¢ New Beetle - Stock & Modified - All Years. Classes are subject to change depending on sponsorship commitment.

Send Check and Info to MAVWC 2985 S. Clement Ave, Bay View, WI 53207 or call J Harvey at 414-483-9171 for details.

http://www.mavwc.com/

entry.title: VolksFest 2014
entry.summary:
VOLKSFEST 2014

MAVWC VOLKSFEST 2014 will be our 21st year!! The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is a not for profit organization of Volkswagen enthusiasts. VOLKSFEST, our annual show, which will be on June 7th, 2014 is a one-day car show with the support of Concours Motors 1400 W Silver Spring â€¦
entry.content:
VOLKSFEST 2014

MAVWC VOLKSFEST 2014 will be our 21st year!! The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club is a not for profit organization of Volkswagen enthusiasts. VOLKSFEST, our annual show, which will be on June 7th, 2014 is a one-day car show with the support of Concours Motors 1400 W Silver Spring Drive, Milwaukee, WI 53209. We have over 18 classes with 1st, 2nd and 3rd place trophies. Admission is free for spectators while registration for exhibitors is $10. Proceeds benefit Childrenâ€™s Hospital of Wisconsin & the Cancer Foundation. The show includes raffles, music & food.

More information: http://www.mavwc.com/ http://www.concoursmotors.com/ 414-290-1525

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club was founded by a small group of people who shared a common interest. To bring together fellow VW enthusiasts to share and help one another enjoy their mutual love for all VW vehicles. The MAVWC is a volunteer not for profit organization which is devoted â€¦
entry.content:
The Milwaukee Area Volkswagen Club was founded by a small group of people who shared a common interest. To bring together fellow VW enthusiasts to share and help one another enjoy their mutual love for all VW vehicles. The MAVWC is a volunteer not for profit organization which is devoted to the restoration, preservation, and customizing of out beloved Volkswagens. All vehicles, manufactured and powered by Volkswagen, are included.

Join the MAVWC Facebook page for the latest announcements and discussion!
